Package net.minestom.server.utils

Class BlockPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minestom.server.utils.BlockPosition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, PublicCloneable<BlockPosition>
    public class BlockPosition
extends java.lang.Object
implements PublicCloneable<BlockPosition>
    Represents the position of a block, so with integers instead of floating numbers.

      • BlockPosition

        public BlockPosition​(float x,
                     float y,
                     float z)
        Creates a new BlockPosition.

        Float positions are converted to block position, notably used by Position.toBlockPosition().

        Parameters:
        x - the block X
        y - the block Y
        z - the block Z

        Returns:

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance​(@NotNull
                          BlockPosition blockPosition)
        Gets the distance to another block position. In cases where performance matters, getDistanceSquared(BlockPosition) should be used as it does not perform the expensive Math.sqrt method.
        Parameters:
        blockPosition - the block position to check the distance
        Returns:
        the distance between 'this' and blockPosition

      • getDistanceSquared

        public int getDistanceSquared​(@NotNull
                              BlockPosition blockPosition)
        Gets the square distance to another block position.
        Parameters:
        blockPosition - the block position to check the distance
        Returns:
        the distance between 'this' and blockPosition
